name: Savage Eden: The Battle for Laghaim
name_original: Savage Eden: The Battle for Laghaim
description:
Savage Eden: The Battle for Laghaim is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Galaxy Gate and NAKO Interactive. It was originally released in 2004. iEntertainment Network published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Savage Eden: The Battle for Laghaim on PC.
